HELP

i successfully downloaded and it plays with audio and video alright, however it is not synchronized,,
the audio is about 10 seconds before the video hits that particular point,

could anybody PLEASE explain how to fix this problem
regarding the synch-problem. i use VLC-player and re-synced the sound delaying it 5500 milliseconds. press ctrl-s and the synching field is under "sound", advanced alternatives.

yeah, it's a great movie, altough not synchonized :-(

@opiniatre: can i be so bold to ask if you could seed original dvd?

Same thing.
Thanks and bla bla bla...

Really good Doco but
...not synchronized!!

Is so difficult man??!

It would be fantastic if you consider to FIX this problem.

Contaminator request is good deal if you are not able.

C`mon!!

Yup, definitely WAY out of sync. But: Fixable in 2 min:
Grab AVI-Mux GUI, add 5300 ms delay to audio stream, mux.
Thanks for the upload, opiniatre. Thanks maltjik, seeders.
dl'ing now, everyone seed as much as possible and i'll seed for as long as possible tomorrow.
